March 27, 1976 D SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest South West BBA Spring Brass Band Festival swbba-spring-brass-band-festival-champio-2478
Queen's Theatre, Barnstaple, Devon, England, UK Test piece awards: 1st: Shapland and Peter Cup and £6 music voucher 2nd: Cecil Lake Cup and £3 music voucher 3rd: Trood Cup
March contest also held: 1st: Bodmin Town (184pts) 2nd: South Molton Town (182pts)
April 9, 2012, 7:03 p.m. April 9, 2012, 7:07 p.m.
1 Bodmin Town Band R. Downs
